unnormalised: Yeah, the new Python update v3.12.2 is supposed to fix the memory leak issues ppl were facing, esp. when working with Django 4.2. So, devs should defo check it out.
normalised: Yeah, the new Python update version three point twelve point two is supposed to fix the memory leak issues people were facing, especially when working with D-jango four point two. So, developers should definitely check it out.
